channel.title: To Do List: Sensor Kits
channel.description:
Sensor Kit related tasks: -------------------------
1. [Looking for collaborators in the Southern Hemisphere!][1]
2. Help us research and review sensors: 3. [Temperature sensors][2] 4. [Humidity sensors][3] 5. [Pesticide / VOC sensors][4] 6. [Infrared sensors][5] 7. [Audio sensors][6]
8. [What additional factors indicate a colonies health?][7]
9. [Sensor and beehive integration][8]
**Sign up to become an [OFFICIAL COLLABORATOR][9]**
[1]: http://community.opensourcebeehives.net/t/looking-for-collaborators-in-the-southern-hemisphere/69 [2]: http://community.opensourcebeehives.net/t/temperature-sensors-reserach/45 [3]: http://community.opensourcebeehives.net/t/research-humidity-sensors/46 [4]: http://community.opensourcebeehives.net/t/research-pesticide-voc-sensors/47 [5]: http://community.opensourcebeehives.net/t/research-infrared-sensors/48 [6]: http://community.opensourcebeehives.net/t/research-audio-sensors/49 [7]: http://community.opensourcebeehives.net/t/what-factors-indicate-a-colonies-health/38 [8]: http://community.opensourcebeehives.net/t/sensor-beehive-integration/50 [9]: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/15JKKNMnB5Qfg_-e_3tlqqauB6GLfPLucrd2rbQ2zwwM/viewform

item.title: To Do List: Sensor Kits
item.author: no-reply@example.com (@trizcs Tristan Copley Smith)
item.description:
Tristan Copley Smith wrote:

Sensor Kit related tasks:

  1. Looking for collaborators in the Southern Hemisphere!

  2. Help us research and review sensors:

    1. Temperature sensors
    2. Humidity sensors
    3. Pesticide / VOC sensors
    4. Infrared sensors
    5. Audio sensors

  3. What additional factors indicate a colonies health?

  4. Sensor and beehive integration

Sign up to become an OFFICIAL COLLABORATOR

Read full topic
